explains: n. 柏油碎石路面；铺有柏油碎石的飞机跑道

sentences.en: Standing on the tarmac were two American planes.
sentences.cn: 停在跑道上的是两架美国飞机。

sentences.en: Three planes were standing on the tarmac, waiting to take off.
sentences.cn: 三架飞机停在跑道上，等候起飞。

sentences.en: This reminds me unpleasantly of Sunnyhill School in Streatham, with its harsh tarmac, where I used to hang about in corners fantasising about wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这让我不愉快地想起了斯特里塔姆（Streatham）的桑尼希尔学校（Sunnyhill School），那里有粗糙的柏油路，我曾在那的角落里闲逛，幻想着野生动植物。
